attributes.action: Provide money from the National Lottery for the RNLI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, propose to the Prime Minister that funding from the National Lottery goes To the RNLI towards their daily running costs.
As Sea Anglers we may, if not already need the services of the RNLI sometimes in our lives. The job they do is second to none. They rely entirely on public funding.
The National Lottery was put in place to assist charities etc, so lets see them assist this worthwhile cause.
